events.name: China's emergence in global EV battery supply chains
events.wd_label: China's emergence in global EV battery supply chains
events.wd_description: Over the past decade, China has become a dominant force in global EV battery supply chains through strategic financial investments, acquisition of critical mineral resources, manufacturing facilities, and technological expertise.
events.description: Over the past decade, China has become a dominant force in global EV battery supply chains through strategic financial investments, acquisition of critical mineral resources, manufacturing facilities, and technological expertise.

events.name: Financial investments
events.wd_description: China has made assertive financial commitments to dominate the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: China has made assertive financial commitments to dominate the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Strategic acquisitions
events.wd_description: China has acquired strategic mineral resources and state-owned enterprises, enhancing its control over critical battery raw materials like lithium, cobalt, and graphite.
events.description: China has acquired strategic mineral resources and state-owned enterprises, enhancing its control over critical battery raw materials like lithium, cobalt, and graphite.

events.name: Manufacturing facilities
events.wd_description: China possesses over fifty percent of the world's capacity to manufacture battery cells and high-nickel cathodes.
events.description: China possesses over fifty percent of the world's capacity to manufacture battery cells and high-nickel cathodes.

events.name: Technological expertise
events.wd_description: China has developed significant technological expertise in battery manufacturing, further solidifying its dominance.
events.description: China has developed significant technological expertise in battery manufacturing, further solidifying its dominance.

events.name: Strategic implications and risks of China's dominance
events.wd_label: Strategic implications and risks of China's dominance
events.wd_description: China's dominance in the EV battery supply chain presents potential threats to energy security and national security for countries converting their vehicle fleets to electric propulsion, while offering economic benefits to leaders in battery technology.
events.description: China's dominance in the EV battery supply chain presents potential threats to energy security and national security for countries converting their vehicle fleets to electric propulsion, while offering economic benefits to leaders in battery technology.

events.name: Energy security risks
events.wd_description: Reliance on China for critical battery components presents potential threats to energy security for nations converting their vehicle fleets to electric propulsion.
events.description: Reliance on China for critical battery components presents potential threats to energy security for nations converting their vehicle fleets to electric propulsion.

events.name: National security risks
events.wd_description: Dependence on a single country for critical technology poses national security risks.
events.description: Dependence on a single country for critical technology poses national security risks.

events.name: Economic benefits
events.wd_description: Countries that lead in advanced battery technologies will gain significant economic benefits as the global adoption of electric vehicles accelerates.
events.description: Countries that lead in advanced battery technologies will gain significant economic benefits as the global adoption of electric vehicles accelerates.

events.name: Strategic objectives
events.wd_description: Reducing reliance on batteries manufactured in China becomes a critical strategic objective for many nations.
events.description: Reducing reliance on batteries manufactured in China becomes a critical strategic objective for many nations.

events.name: Challenges and policy alternatives to reduce reliance on China
events.wd_label: Challenges and policy alternatives to reduce reliance on China
events.wd_description: Reducing reliance on Chinese batteries requires significant time and investment. Policy alternatives include enhanced subsidies, tax exemptions, investments in domestic refining, and establishing trade partnerships with resource-rich nations.
events.description: Reducing reliance on Chinese batteries requires significant time and investment. Policy alternatives include enhanced subsidies, tax exemptions, investments in domestic refining, and establishing trade partnerships with resource-rich nations.

events.name: Time and investment challenges
events.wd_description: Reconstructing domestic battery supply chains by other nations will require five to ten years and significant investment.
events.description: Reconstructing domestic battery supply chains by other nations will require five to ten years and significant investment.

events.name: Policy alternatives
events.wd_description: Policy alternatives include enhanced subsidies, tax exemptions, and increased investments in domestic battery raw material refining and advanced cell/cathode manufacturing facilities.
events.description: Policy alternatives include enhanced subsidies, tax exemptions, and increased investments in domestic battery raw material refining and advanced cell/cathode manufacturing facilities.

events.name: Trade partnerships
events.wd_description: Establishing trade and investment partnerships with resource-rich nations can ensure alternative foreign sources of critical inputs like lithium or cobalt.
events.description: Establishing trade and investment partnerships with resource-rich nations can ensure alternative foreign sources of critical inputs like lithium or cobalt.

events.name: WTO trade remedies
events.wd_description: Nations should use trade remedies permitted by WTO regulations to combat unfair competition from Chinese firms receiving substantial state subsidies.
events.description: Nations should use trade remedies permitted by WTO regulations to combat unfair competition from Chinese firms receiving substantial state subsidies.

events.name: Competition and policy implementation for battery supply chain control
events.wd_label: Competition and policy implementation for battery supply chain control
events.wd_description: Competition between China and other major economies to control the battery supply chains for EVs is expected to intensify. Countries must implement proactive policies to mitigate supply chain disruptions and price fluctuations.
events.description: Competition between China and other major economies to control the battery supply chains for EVs is expected to intensify. Countries must implement proactive policies to mitigate supply chain disruptions and price fluctuations.

events.name: Competition with China
events.wd_description: Competition between China and other major economies to control battery supply chains is likely to intensify over the next decade.
events.description: Competition between China and other major economies to control battery supply chains is likely to intensify over the next decade.

events.name: Proactive policies
events.wd_description: Countries must implement proactive and consistent policies to mitigate supply chain risks.
events.description: Countries must implement proactive and consistent policies to mitigate supply chain risks.

events.name: Supply chain disruptions
events.wd_description: Mitigating susceptibility to potential disruptions in supplies is essential for maintaining a stable battery supply chain.
events.description: Mitigating susceptibility to potential disruptions in supplies is essential for maintaining a stable battery supply chain.

events.name: Price fluctuations
events.wd_description: Policies must address potential price fluctuations in battery components and materials.
events.description: Policies must address potential price fluctuations in battery components and materials.

events.name: China's influence on global lithium supply chains
events.wd_label: China's influence on global lithium supply chains
events.wd_description: China does not control the majority of global lithium mining and extraction but has systematically dominated critical midstream links connecting lithium producers with battery manufacturers. This includes significant chemical processing capacity and foreign lithium reserve acquisitions.
events.description: China does not control the majority of global lithium mining and extraction but has systematically dominated critical midstream links connecting lithium producers with battery manufacturers. This includes significant chemical processing capacity and foreign lithium reserve acquisitions.

events.name: Midstream control
events.wd_description: China has focused on dominating critical midstream links in the lithium supply chain.
events.description: China has focused on dominating critical midstream links in the lithium supply chain.

events.name: Chemical processing capacity
events.wd_description: China's investment in chemical facilities converts lithium concentrates into high-purity lithium hydroxide or carbonate, essential for battery production.
events.description: China's investment in chemical facilities converts lithium concentrates into high-purity lithium hydroxide or carbonate, essential for battery production.

events.name: Foreign lithium reserves
events.wd_description: China has acquired foreign lithium reserves to further control the global lithium supply chain.
events.description: China has acquired foreign lithium reserves to further control the global lithium supply chain.

events.name: Impact of China's integrated control on battery supply chains
events.wd_label: Impact of China's integrated control on battery supply chains
events.wd_description: China's integrated control over lithium supply chains, from mine sites to intermediate chemical facilities, allows it to influence product flows through final cell fabrication. Competitors rely on Chinese supply chains, making it difficult to reverse dependency without significant investment.
events.description: China's integrated control over lithium supply chains, from mine sites to intermediate chemical facilities, allows it to influence product flows through final cell fabrication. Competitors rely on Chinese supply chains, making it difficult to reverse dependency without significant investment.

events.name: Integrated control
events.wd_description: China's control spans investments at mine sites to intermediate chemical facilities, influencing global lithium supply chains.
events.description: China's control spans investments at mine sites to intermediate chemical facilities, influencing global lithium supply chains.

events.name: Competitor reliance
events.wd_description: Competitors lack integrated capacity, forcing reliance on supply chains centered within China.
events.description: Competitors lack integrated capacity, forcing reliance on supply chains centered within China.

events.name: Reversing dependency
events.wd_description: Reversing dependency on Chinese supply chains requires significant capital investment from other nations to develop alternative lithium reserves and localized refining.
events.description: Reversing dependency on Chinese supply chains requires significant capital investment from other nations to develop alternative lithium reserves and localized refining.
